tasks.task: Setting up an off-grid garden irrigation system
subtasks: Assembling the solar panel structure
Connecting the solar panels to the charge controller
Setting up the well pump and timer
Installing the battery for power
Configuring the irrigation system
Adjusting the drip system pressure with a regulator
Ensuring the drip tape is properly connected

tasks.task: Installing the irrigation system in the garden
subtasks: Routing the drip tape through the garden beds
Connecting header pipes to the drip tape
Testing the irrigation system under rain conditions
